name: godetia

a garden plant grown for its attractive flowers with pink and pale purple petals : Godetias sown this way also come quickly into bloom. You can create a lovely effect with old-fashioned, cottage-garden flowers like sweet pea, nasturtium, and godetia.
More examplesFewer examplesOnce spring is over, she plants summer bedding plants, such as godetia, petunias, and mallow.Godetia is a close relative of the evening primrose.Annual poppies look wonderful planted with other annuals, such as godetias.
